summary: Comprehensive testing of Skillax Digital Marketing Academy website completed. All 16 features tested successfully. Backend APIs (19/19 tests passed), Frontend UI, Admin Portal, Chatbot, and all new pages (AI & Tools, Careers, About with Kerala Map, Certifications with 25+ logos) working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Hero title shows '15+' instead of '25+' but stats section correctly shows '25+ Certifications'

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint working (19/19 pytest tests passed)
Lead creation via /api/leads works (website, chatbot, career_assessment sources)
Contact form submission via /api/contact works
Courses API returns 2 courses (Professional 4 months, AI 2 months)
Course detail by slug works for both courses
Blogs API working
Admin login with admin@skillax.in / SkillaxAdmin2024! works
Admin profile retrieval works
Admin leads management (authenticated access) works
Analytics summary endpoint works
Chatbot API endpoint works
Home page loads with hero section, animations, and 25+ certifications badge
Navigation has all pages: Home, About, Courses, Certifications, AI & Tools, Careers, Blog, Contact
About page shows Kerala Digital Map with Infopark (50,000+ jobs), Technopark (70,000+ jobs), Cyberpark (15,000+ jobs), Wayanad opportunities
About page shows Digital Transformation statistics with animated counters
About page shows Traditional vs Digital shift comparison cards (Newspaper Ads ‚Üí Google & Meta Ads, etc.)
Certifications page displays 25+ logo marquee with scrolling animation (Google, Meta, HubSpot, SEMrush, etc.)
AI & Tools page loads with ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, Copilot, Grok, Claude sections
AI & Tools page shows SEO/AEO/GEO section
Careers page displays career paths with salary information (‚Çπ3-5 LPA to ‚Çπ10-30+ LPA)
Careers page career assessment form submission works (modal opens with form fields)
Contact page form submission to /api/leads works (success message displayed)
Chatbot opens and responds to messages with course information
Chatbot has quick question buttons (üìö Courses, üí∞ Fees, üè¢ Internship, etc.)
Admin login works with email/password
Admin dashboard shows analytics (Total Leads: 14, Website Leads: 10, Chatbot Leads: 1, Active Courses: 2)
Admin can view leads in dashboard with source breakdown
Theme toggle (light/dark) works correctly
seed_data_creation: Test leads created via pytest with TEST_ prefix for identification
context_for_next_testing_agent: All major features tested and working. New pages (AI & Tools, Careers) fully functional. Kerala Digital Map shows Infopark/Technopark/Cyberpark opportunities. Certifications marquee displays 25+ logos. Admin dashboard shows lead analytics. Chatbot responds with predefined Q&A. Theme toggle works. Minor cosmetic issue: Certifications hero shows '15+' but stats show '25+' correctly.
